question: Which continent exports the maximum quantity of paper in 2019?
explanation: European countries sold the most paper exports during 2019 with shipments valued at $94.7 billion (55.5% of globally exported paper). In second place were Asian exporters at 26.5% of worldwide paper shipments ahead of North America at 14.3%. Smaller percentages came from Latin America (2.4%) excluding Mexico but including the Caribbean, Oceania (0.6%) led by Australia and New Zealand and Africa (also 0.6%).
